WorkItem.ClosedComment: More complex issue than desired for a simple script to multi-target in multiple build environments. The core cs files and the project have been tested with MSBuild 4 and xbuild. Project should build without issue on win/linux/mac without issue.
WorkItem.Description:
Complete build system with easy switches for different versions of .NET and Mono.

Currently targeted to support .Net 3.5-4.5 and Mono 2.10.x
